title: The First Night
flavor_text: The first whispers are always the softest, but they echo the longest.

primary_win_condition.description: Play 4 different Toys and create 4 Spirits.

alternative_win_condition.description: Generate 5 total mana using card effects (in addition to normal turn mana gain).

first_memory_setup.description: During setup, choose a Toy from your hand to be your First Memory. Mark it with the First Memory marker and place it face-up in play before the game begins.

params.prompt_text: Nightmare Creep: Discard a card or sacrifice a Spirit.

nightmare_creep_effect.description: Each turn after 4 (i.e., effectively on turn 5 and onwards), discard a card or sacrifice a Spirit.

player_notes: Place 4 counters near your play area to track Toys played and 4 counters to track Spirits created.
Advanced mechanics are not yet available in this memory fragment.

setup_instructions.description: Start with Toy Cow With Bell That Never Rings in hand. Begin with 1 mana on your first turn (then follow normal progression).

special_rules_text: LIMIT/TWIST: None (the night is young, and the rules still bend to daylight's lingering touch)

first_memory_setup.description: During setup, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. If you find a Toy among them, you may choose one to be your First Memory... and put it into your hand.

nightmare_creep_effect.description: Each turn after 4 (i.e., effectively on turn 5 and onwards), discard a card or sacrifice a Spirit.

setup_instructions.description: Start with Ghost Doll With Hollow Eyes in play. You may search your deck for Fluffstorm of Forgotten Names before turn 3.

special_rules_text: Hand size limit: 4 (the whispers crowd your thoughts, leaving little room for clarity)
